descriptor.name: f3e4f7fd-a254-4f0c-b8c0-0266a9dcdaed
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces are planning to launch several ships that could threaten our operations. Keep those ships from launching until our forces are ready to fight them.

descriptor.name: 0945f671-0bd7-40d6-a32a-93b9e67dfc7d
descriptor.locDesc: Enemy warships have been wreaking havoc in the area. Ground those ships before they can do any more damage.

descriptor.name: f361791b-a749-4183-bd7f-dbb8a10b1461
descriptor.locDesc: We've got reports of hazardous materials at one of our facilities. Dispose of them safely so we can retake the location.

descriptor.name: 06b94fd1-7a9b-4016-93da-caf950305061
descriptor.locDesc: We're tracking a few cargo ships ferrying supplies to enemy forces. Find those ships and take them out.

descriptor.name: 14cbf1e2-e427-4011-9e36-b81ed3256366
descriptor.locDesc: We need to determine whether hostile forces intend to capture one of our installations or destroy it entirely. Hit their supply base and identify the loadout of their heavy weapons.

descriptor.name: a6ee14d8-c7fe-4888-b88f-23787d0fd812
descriptor.locDesc: We have reason to believe one of our people is giving intel to the enemy. Hit an enemy communication center and get us a name.

descriptor.name: f9595cee-4e6c-42d6-91d1-eb98bca721a6
descriptor.locDesc: We're planning a large operation and need to know the response time and strength of our targets. Poke the hornet's nest and report on their reactions.

descriptor.name: 0a33accb-4108-4b9b-9388-3db4f40e12bc
descriptor.locDesc: An agent embedded among enemy forces left us vital intel at a dead drop. Locate and retrieve it before enemy troops discover the drop.

descriptor.name: 7137c678-e3b2-4c20-8064-e137ebedaefd
descriptor.locDesc: An engineering team is en route to a critical mission, and we believe the mission plan has leaked. Get to the mission site and take out any hostiles before the team arrives.

descriptor.name: 6b04d12f-8c69-4901-91f1-a94ee47d478b
descriptor.locDesc: Sensitive equipment vital to terraforming and colonization efforts is at risk of falling into enemy hands. Protect it at all costs.

descriptor.name: 543e827f-0c1f-4d1b-9e7e-c96739ee28f9
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces are resisting our attempts to gain a foothold in the area. Hit their base and sabotage their operations while we prepare an offensive.

descriptor.name: 28b6941d-2b82-45cb-9ecf-3b4767a29101
descriptor.locDesc: We've spotted a large enemy force with gaps in their security. Sneak in and take out their supplies to leave them vulnerable.

descriptor.name: 9c6685ec-754e-4521-94b7-2cfa887b223a
descriptor.locDesc: An enemy group is performing medical research thatâ€™s yielded some promising and dangerous results. Infiltrate the facility and get us that research.

descriptor.name: bc381786-e4f6-4d6a-a553-122da24810f4
descriptor.locDesc: We need the enemy to pay attention to something other than our planned activity. Hit them as loudly as possible to draw their attention so that we can deploy forces covertly.

descriptor.name: 6796fd86-2d62-402d-b317-a665e51ef39c
descriptor.locDesc: We've got intel about bad blood between multiple hostile groups in the area, and we'd like to encourage that. Take out one group and leave evidence to incriminate another.

descriptor.name: b758ab84-43c8-47ea-974c-3a8b81fb7a25
descriptor.locDesc: We've heard rumors of enemy forces moving weapons through the area. Hit the enemy base and find out what they're moving, and where.

descriptor.name: 2f4b1ffd-c745-47c3-89aa-5d8f101e35da
descriptor.locDesc: We've located wreckage that can be salvaged for useful supplies. Send a team to recover what they can.

descriptor.name: c9e1d494-c7f0-40b7-b7c7-09b93efcf790
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces appear to be planning an attack, but it may be a feint to distract us. Harry their defenses and get an accurate estimation of their strength.

descriptor.name: afc515f4-b56a-460d-9822-40d231049be1
descriptor.locDesc: Sensors detected a transmitter that's relaying enemy communications. Dispatch a team to disable it.

descriptor.name: 1c7c0aea-ffa9-415f-a191-67d170724861
descriptor.locDesc: One of our people turned traitor and is working with hostile forces. Hunt him down and take him out before he does any more damage.

descriptor.name: c78e2390-aedb-410c-a9f7-918bb42e0c66
descriptor.locDesc: To utilize a potential site, we need to secure it against enemy bombardment. Secure the facility so we can establish anti-ship batteries.

descriptor.name: 0fed35af-4958-49f6-b925-57866bdce6eb
descriptor.locDesc: Intel says data on enemy combat plans is en route to a key adversary. Send a team to keep that data from reaching its target.

descriptor.name: 55ac7934-180c-4449-a14a-335c111dad59
descriptor.locDesc: We received reports of a new facility, and it's not clear who is running or what their goal is. Investigate and determine if the facility presents a threat.

descriptor.name: 093d6a72-fd57-4a93-9900-d5d5d08d1219
descriptor.locDesc: We've been unable to break the enemy's recent encryption protocols. Hit their listening post and obtain an encryption key before they can destroy their own data.

descriptor.name: 928fe966-c9ac-48cc-9236-9aea952299bc
descriptor.locDesc: The enemy is in possession of detailed mining locations. Hit their operations center and get us those sites.

descriptor.name: cafbb2df-6561-40e0-8817-46d7332508ec
descriptor.locDesc: Outlaws are harassing one of our outposts. Send in a team to protect it until we can establish permanent defenses.

descriptor.name: 4fbf5bc5-c212-4aa1-bb80-b39c8bd7270f
descriptor.locDesc: Enemy forces recently targeted a small unarmed ship and killed all aboard. Send them a message about what happens to people who kill unarmed civilians.

descriptor.name: fba8cc24-64de-4da0-87da-82f30cb7e286
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces are set to receive a major weapons shipment. Take out the enemy team and stop that weapons shipment from reaching its destination.

descriptor.name: e34fdd68-b4cf-4ff9-8fdd-a06994717b31
descriptor.locDesc: Sensors detected a potentially valuable new area. Assemble a discovery team and dispatch them to investigate.

descriptor.name: 2feccf41-1fcb-49e8-a4e9-b6754e5f0bb1
descriptor.locDesc: Friendly forces are trying to escape enemy pursuit. Clear them a path, and discourage the enemy from coming after them.

descriptor.name: 2ade8e9e-3313-4bee-99a8-4e0ce1cf380e
descriptor.locDesc: We need a team to eliminate a target that's smuggling arms to a nasty outlaw group.

descriptor.name: 4f5a89a2-1d32-47cf-8cea-45592054153f
descriptor.locDesc: Dispatch a team to hack an enemy transmitter we recently located and relay relevant intel discovered.

descriptor.name: 0f249b79-fd2b-470e-a913-1a71194c0f86
descriptor.locDesc: Enemy operatives planted taps to monitor a number of our comms. We need a team to find and remove those devices.

descriptor.name: 923d249e-de07-4ab8-ac40-07e9cb4cb399
descriptor.locDesc: Rumors of a significant Remnant artifact have surfaced. Send a team to investigate and recover anything they find.

descriptor.name: 172833d2-1eb6-4d75-8ac2-146c737cec1c
descriptor.locDesc: The enemy is moving troops through a key area. Disrupt their activities to open some holes in their defenses.

descriptor.name: 5fde975b-ac74-4f1a-a42d-4a871f21e9e4
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces are putting pressure on our people. Take out their supply line to give our troops room to breathe.

descriptor.name: 0cf75366-14e2-43ac-b310-b13c18c62b78
descriptor.locDesc: Our planned surveillance operations are blocked by the presence of an enemy base near our ideal site. Take out that base and give us a hiding place.

descriptor.name: 1cd78caa-4af8-43e2-acf1-3c6aea916629
descriptor.locDesc: Our efforts have been stymied by a supply shortage. We need you to take an enemy facility and convert it to a supply depot we can use.

descriptor.name: 550e24c6-4f3b-49e7-a475-8a9e98abb8c2
descriptor.locDesc: Unknown signals are interfering with our communications in the area. Check the origin coordinates, find the source, and shut it down if hostile.

descriptor.name: 1d582096-80cf-42aa-82b8-70e5c3273c6a
descriptor.locDesc: Enemies have been catching us by surprise, and we've been unable to locate their strike ship. Hit their resupply center and find out where that ship is.

descriptor.name: be33ef87-dee9-4748-92f4-72415c1236ce
descriptor.locDesc: Rumors are circulating about schematics for a new prototype based on Remnant tech, and we need to investigate. Get into the targeted research facility and find out if the rumors are true.

descriptor.name: a59a4d3b-3849-4f30-84fd-f3e2dd7d0fa7
descriptor.locDesc: Enemy forces stole our data on possible habitation sites, then corrupted our local copies. Hit their site and get us that data back.

descriptor.name: 69db5592-2b8c-4682-8500-532eeb92dcd7
descriptor.locDesc: Enemies were reported in the area. Hunt them down!

descriptor.name: c1277f53-922f-4a41-81a1-7fd82d9312ce
descriptor.locDesc: The enemy has been quiet lately, and it's likely that they're planning something. Hit one of their listening posts and pull any intel on upcoming plans.

descriptor.name: 880a6c23-7540-478b-beb9-731b6ea545bc
descriptor.locDesc: Enemy forces are threatening an important supply route. Clear our people a safe path.

descriptor.name: 8dcbe489-5f4a-4a28-ad28-36e946537b4b
descriptor.locDesc: We recently lost several supply stations to enemy saboteurs. Unfortunately for them, we located their base. Get in there and take them down.

descriptor.name: 6fca269d-46fc-443b-9ac0-2f1698fc09a4
descriptor.locDesc: We received intel on a hidden cache of resources. Send a team to recover itâ€”we need every advantage we can get.

descriptor.name: 304dceea-6f20-4689-958b-43915e4349c5
descriptor.locDesc: We've got reports of valuable mineral resources in an area with hostile activity. Find out if the enemy is sitting on anything we want, and make them think twice about how much they want it.

descriptor.name: 5202a530-629c-4990-a3e2-50e8a81b6b7b
descriptor.locDesc: We've picked up some leaked intel that looks too good to be true. Investigate the lead and be ready for an enemy ambush.

descriptor.name: 3430c2eb-c5a8-447c-9194-1aae7b70235f
descriptor.locDesc: We've heard reports of a valuable new tech prototype in the area. Investigate the facility and obtain that prototype.

descriptor.name: 299302af-5030-4551-9a5c-2e06325f1423
descriptor.locDesc: An enemy facility is currently blocking our strategic plans. We need it destroyed quickly and quietly.

descriptor.name: 562954b9-8714-46e3-87c0-0942090b62f8
descriptor.locDesc: Hostile forces stole power generators that one of our colony sites depends on for survival. Hit them hard and get our allies the supplies they need to keep the lights on.

descriptor.name: 069283fe-33eb-4aa7-b71e-2d51c5353abd
descriptor.locDesc: One of our key facilities was taken by enemy forces, costing us supplies and intel. Retake the facility before the enemy can lock it down.

descriptor.name: 7c3141d4-512f-4bd2-a6d1-0d674a55a6e8
descriptor.locDesc: A special mission, available for a limited time for a special occasion.
